insert hook into next st yo and pull through to front of work and through loop on hook st s = stitch es yo = yarn over magic_ring this hat begins with an adjustable loop or magic_ring if you are not familiar with this technique i highly recommend typing magic_ring crochet into your preferred search engine to learn how to do it however if you prefer not to use the magic_ring method you can chain 2 stitches and then work into the second chain from the hook as directed for example if the pattern reads make a magic_ring esc 8 times into ring… you could instead chain 2 esc 8 times into the second chain from the hook directions hat is worked top down in the round without joining round 1 using larger hook make a magic_ring chain 1 esc 8 times into ring pull on beginning yarn tail to tighten ring
